backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user registration, OTP verification, admin authentication, and access control with mixins for blob storage and authorization; manages user profiles, registrations, and admin credentials.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files describing the registration flow, admin panel, validation, styling, and component architecture.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind layers defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes, including sidebar, chart, and destructive color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta, title "Star Maharashtra Galaxy Internet", Orbitron font preload, and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing view state between RegistrationFlow and AdminPanel with splash screen gating and registration flow remounting on admin panel exit.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Animated splash screen component with galaxy background, company title, tagline, skip button, floating decorative circles, and reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Admin panel component with authentication gating, registration list/detail dual-pane UI, edit mode, delete functionality, admin check, and error boundaries.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Card component for admin access recovery offering setup code application and username/password login with diagnostics showing current principal and admin status.
React error boundary component that catches and displays errors in the admin detail panel, with retry functionality, error copying to clipboard, and automatic reset when children change.
React error boundary component for the entire admin panel that displays error details with copy-to-clipboard functionality and options to retry or refresh the page.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/D: Component that displays document images from ExternalBlob objects with loading states, error handling, retry functionality, and a placeholder variant for missing documents.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/E: Form component for editing registration details (category, payment method, router) with change detection, validation, and mutation handling using React Query.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/R: Main panel component displaying detailed registration information including customer details, documents, and actions like edit, delete, download, and print with various loading and empty states.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useAdm: React Query mutation hook for admin password login that normalizes backend errors into user-friendly messages and invalidates relevant queries on successful authentication.

Provides React Query hooks for admin operations: checking admin status, fetching registrations, deleting registrations with optimistic updates, and updating registration details (category, payment method, router).
Exports a mutation hook to apply admin setup codes by storing them in sessionStorage and invalidating actor/admin queries to trigger re-authentication with normalized error handling.
frontend/src/features/admin/utils/adminD: Utility functions to download individual documents from ExternalBlob and batch-download all available documents (Aadhaar, PAN, receipt, photo) for a registration with sanitized filenames.
frontend/src/features/admin/utils/adminP: Generates print-friendly HTML for customer registrations including personal info, service details, terms acceptance, and document checklist with inline CSS for printing.
frontend/src/features/admin/utils/regist: Helper functions for registration data: building display names, checking for missing data, formatting timestamps, safely accessing documents, and checking receipt existence.
frontend/src/features/registration/compo: React error boundary component that catches registration step errors and displays a fallback UI with error details, retry/refresh buttons, and clipboard copy functionality for error reporting.
frontend/src/features/registration/hooks: Custom React hook that detects double-click/double-tap interactions and shows a temporary hint after single interactions, with configurable thresholds and durations.
Provides React Query mutations for registration flow including OTP generation/verification and registration submission, with automatic user role granting and error normalization.
frontend/src/features/registration/Regis: Main registration flow component managing four steps (customer details, documents, terms, OTP) with progress tracking, navigation controls, validation state management, and double-interaction admin panel access.
frontend/src/features/registration/steps: Registration form step for collecting customer personal information (name, contact, address, category, payment option, router provision) with validation and error display.
Registration step that handles Internet Identity authentication, OTP generation/verification via phone number, and final registration submission with success/error states.
Displays terms and conditions with checkbox acceptance, includes print functionality with URL sanitization, and shows acceptance proof with customer details and timestamp.
Registration step for uploading verification documents (Aadhaar, PAN, optional payment receipt and photo) with file preview and validation based on payment method.
frontend/src/features/registration/terms: Exports static terms and conditions content organized into sections for router terms and service terms.
frontend/src/features/registration/types: Defines TypeScript interfaces for registration data including CustomerDetailsData (personal info, category, payment), DocumentsData (file uploads), and StepProps for multi-step form validation.
frontend/src/features/registration/utils: Normalizes backend errors (traps, OTP issues, authentication failures) into user-friendly English messages with a [Registration] prefix for consistent error handling.
frontend/src/features/registration/valid: Validates CustomerDetailsData fields including required fields, phone format (10 digits), age requirement (18+), email format, and minimum address length.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the backend actor with authentication, initializes access control with admin token from URL params, and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system for light/dark themes, admin panel dark mode styling, and splash screen galaxy background with animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and secure parameter clearing from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom OKLCH color variables, Inter/Orbitron fonts, container settings, extended theme colors for UI components, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state tracking admin authentication issues where a user lost their Internet Identity anchor and needs their new principal ID 'p-3sib2-hfxnj-zit4w-kqyca-3r66g' added to the backend admin whitelist. Two pending action requests: update admin whitelist and redeploy the application.
